pre_caption: This video consists of a single, static aerial shot, resembling a satellite image. It displays Tokyo Bay, surrounded by the dense urban sprawl of the city on one side and green, forested land on the other. A large, dark, cross-shaped structure is superimposed over the bay, illustrating a proposed plan.
